title: Kendrick Lamar and SZA deliver a stadium-worthy performance
description: The pair performed as part of their joint Grand National Tour, delivering their greatest hits.
content:
With any tour that features more than one headliner, it's difficult to determine the audience split, but the London fans greeted both performers with the same adoration.
The crowd's energy for some of Lamar's earliest songs was electric, with mosh pi... [1960 chars]

title: Jess Carter: England defender grateful for 'incredible love' to play in Euro 2025 semi-final win
description: England defender Jess Carter says she could not have had the confidence to play in England's 2-1 defeat of Italy in their Euro 2025 semi-final after being racially abused were it not for the support of fans.
content:
Defender Jess Carter says the support of fans in England's Euro 2025 semi-final against Italy "meant everything" after being racially abused - or she wouldn't have had the confidence to play in the 2-1 win.
The Lionesses booked their spot in a Euros ... [608 chars]

title: US and Japan agree on trade deal with tariffs, Trump says
description: The deal would result in Japan investing $550bn (£407bn) into the US and paying a 15% reciprocal tariff, Trump said.
content:
"I just signed the largest trade deal in history, I think maybe the largest deal in history with Japan," Trump touted at a White House event on Tuesday evening.
"They had their top people here, and we worked on it long and hard. And it's a great deal... [1738 chars]

title: Cardinal calls Israel’s policy in Gaza ‘morally unjustifiable’ after visit
description: Pierbattista Pizzaballa condemns blocks on food and warns against plans to force Palestinians to leave territory
content: Israel’s government is pursuing an “unacceptable and morally unjustifiable” policy in Gaza, the Catholic Latin patriarch of Jerusalem has said after visiting a church in the territory that was attacked by Israeli forces last week and meeting survivor... [4111 chars]
